title: 2TC Standard (Abbey of Kings)
overview: The classic 2TC build with feudal defensive units. Good against ram all-in where white tower doesn't work. Use this build against civs where Longbow Rush or Stable King Opener doesn't work.

phases.name: Dark Age
phases.description: Standard dark age with early gold for flexibility

key_actions.action: House with 1 villager, rally 2 to gold
Build Mining Camp, rally back to food
Click Abbey of Kings with 2 food villagers

success_criteria: Abbey of Kings at 2:10 (faster than Council Hall builds)

common_mistakes.mistake: Using 4 builders on Abbey (slower return to food)
common_mistakes.fix: Use only 2 builders on Abbey, keep rest gathering

phases.name: Feudal Transition
phases.description: Pull gold vills to stone, rally to wood

key_actions.action: Pull 2 gold vills to stone, rally rest to wood
Rally 6 vills to straggler trees (don't build lumber camp yet)
Rally to stone until 7 stone vills
Move 1 landmark builder to straggler tree

common_mistakes.fix: Use straggler trees first, build lumber camp later

phases.name: 2nd TC Drop
phases.description: Drop 2nd TC and transition into mid-game

key_actions.action: Build 2nd TC on gold with farm space between TCs (8+ vills)
Rally to food until 8, then increase wood to 15
Rally 3 vills from 2nd TC to gold
Add Archery Range + Barracks, full produce Longbows + Spears

success_criteria: 25+ units at minute 11 for ram defense

common_mistakes.mistake: 2nd TC too far from main base
common_mistakes.consequence: Harder to defend, villager travel time
common_mistakes.fix: Build on gold with farm space between TCs

common_mistakes.consequence: Lose to ram all-in at 11 min

adaptations.adaptation: Push with 2 TC power spike, don't let them scale

key_insights: This is the defensive alternative to aggressive English openings
Abbey of Kings provides healing to sustain defense
Key is 25+ units by minute 11 to survive ram pushes
Straggler trees save wood for faster 2nd TC
Keep TCs close together for mutual defense
